title: Do Riot still take artwork for small amounts of RP?
body: Im 2RP away from buying Project Katarina was wondering if anyone knew if riot still take ms paint art for this sort of thing?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Yep, just remember that this is a one-time offering.

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for it though, why don't you also share your beautiful artwork on the boards for all to see?
Thanks, you can see it here. http://imgur.com/a/T34BQ
